text: * Ivan Nikčević is a Serbian handballer. * Novica Nikčević is a retired Serbian footballer and current football coach. * Peko Nikčević is a Montenegrin sculptor and professor. * Sandra Nikčević is a Montenegrin handballer * Sanja Nikčević is Croatian theatre critic, distinguished professor of theatre history. * Vojislav Nikčević was a Montenegrin linguist.
title: Nikčević
